title: PTA Bill to be taken up for debate in Parliament next week
body_lines: The debate on the second reading of the Prevention of Terrorism (Amendment) Bill was scheduled for March 22, Communications Department of Parliament said.
The decision was taken at the Business Committee meeting chaired by Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardhane today.
It was also decided to convene Parliament sessions for four days from March 22 to March 25 next week.
